Name: Dry Grass
About the game: Dry Grass is open world survival based game. Your main goal is to survive the worst ! Build bases, build your own car, co-operate, kill intruders, hunt animals, find secret easter eggs, explore or just chicken out and be scared for your life while hiding in dark cave, the life of your character is in your hands!
